item.description:
ARTWALK Newburyport is a self-paced / self-guided tour of several galleries and studios throughout downtown-and beyond Newburyport. They open their doors 3:00 pm - 7:00 pm with special exhibits, discussions, painting demos, live music, refreshments, and more- all in a casual reception environment. Maps can be found online @ www.artwalknewburyport.com or at the visitor's center when you arrive. This event is FREE.

A quote from someone that has attended in the past years; “ARTWALK has always been greNewburyat! Some of the galleries go all out with refreshments, entertainment, and appetizers.”

Please be advised that this is a walking tour and we will be doing a LOT of that.  There is no set plan when finished with the tour- perhaps; Waterfront Park, the new self-serve ice cream parlor, the quaint lounges and restaurants, a walk along the water with some new friends. 

THIS IS A SHARED EVENT WITH OTHER MEETUP GROUPS.

ALL ADULTS WELCOME. 


* WE WILL MEETUP between 3:00 and 3:15 pm In front of The Firehouse Center For The Arts. If facing the center, the bench to the left- by the shady tree, myself or someone will be wearing a meetup.com pin or have a sign. 

MY CONTACT # IS: 978.289.7679 after 1PM. 

 **Parking can be tight - so try to plan accordingly. Please consider carpooling with other members. It’s a great way to get to know someone new or travel with a friend. Just post your comments
item.how_to_find_us: Please read event description -it includes where we will all meetup

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: ARTWALK Newburyport- Last One Of The Season
